name: Intelligent Analyst
description: An intelligent data processing platform for auditing datasets across multiple configured domains. Processes large datasets to identify potential validation and standard violations and provides actionable suggestions for corrections.
role: Architected the application from scratch, developing both front-end and back-end modules, including user management, validation calculations, notifications, and caching

Built services to process and validate large datasets according to configurable domain-specific rules, generating detailed reports of failed validations and confidence scores for individual data fields
Developed an admin system to configure validation rules dynamically for different domains and manage automated validation processes
Enabled actionable insights and corrective suggestions for detected validation and standard violations, improving data quality and audit efficiency
